about_us_text: Khsomat.com, is an e-commerce site in the Arab Republic of Egypt and includes a large number of different products such as categories that include electronics, fashion, household products, watches, perfumes, and others. Dotcom discounts attract a large number of visitors per month, and it grows very quickly due to the increase in the number of Online shoppers in Egypt. Khsomat.com is often called the home of discounts and it functions as a retail site in addition to serving as a marketplace for third-party sellers. Dotcom discounts offers a convenient and safe shopping experience with the ability to pay online, the ability to pay cash upon receipt of goods, and the possibility of returning them for free. Khsomat.com was established in 2021, and it is a pioneer in the field of online shopping as an integrated service site, providing a range of electronic services to visitors. In addition to being headquartered in the Arab Republic of Egypt, Khsomat.com meets the needs of local markets with commercial offices in most governorates of the Arab Republic of Egypt. We strive to change and permanently develop the site, which provides convenience for users. Our site or application develops our logo
